member.name: P:DotNetBrowser.Logging.Logger.Level
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating enabled logging level.

member.name: T:DotNetBrowser.Logging.LoggerProvider
member.summary: Provides access to different DotNetBrowser Loggers which are used to log Browser, IPC and Chromium process messages.

member.name: P:DotNetBrowser.Logging.LoggerProvider.ChromiumLogFile
member.summary: The absolute or relative path to store Chromium log file.

member.name: P:DotNetBrowser.Logging.LoggerProvider.ConsoleLoggingEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether console logging is enabled.

member.name: P:DotNetBrowser.Logging.LoggerProvider.FileLoggingEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether file logging is enabled.

member.name: P:DotNetBrowser.Logging.LoggerProvider.Instance
member.summary: The LoggerProvider instance that can be used to configure DotNetBrowser logging.

member.name: P:DotNetBrowser.Logging.LoggerProvider.Level
member.summary: The minimal logging level of the messages that will appear in the logs. This value will be used to filter out log messages with lower logging level.

member.name: M:DotNetBrowser.Logging.LoggerProvider.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.param: True if managed resources should be disposed
